# **MUNCH**

> "Eat your sorrows away" - nobody ( [source](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/cb647821-dc91-4178-847f-42c98fbcd407/deogqv8-c614049b-bcf6-440a-9765-9f0b8299e350.png?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..asrcbJKBG2WDOG76pc9cFPMQIZZvMiVkV0Qz47u2_14) )

#### MUNCH frees your mind from the trouble of remembering things you need to do, so that you can focus on eating. It's
- Text-based
- Easy to learn
- **Beautiful** user interface

It's amazing :star_struck: :star_struck:

**All you have to do is,**
1. Download it
2. Click it
3. Add your tasks
4. Have faith in it :pray:
5. Have ur meal :hamburger:

#### MUNCH's features
- [x] Simple todo tasks
- [x] Managing deadlines 
- [ ] Reminders (coming soon)

#### If you are a Java programmer, you can use it to practice Java too! Here's the main method
```
public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Application.launch(MainApp.class, args);
    }
}
```
#### So what are you waiting for? Join MUNCH and forget your worries :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:
